channel.title: Making a npc open a shop + having trade button
channel.description:
Hello Moparscapers,
PLZ HELP! I'm having some problems with making my Santa tradeable.
I've done the Santa in auto-spawn and in shops with the ID 31.
After i've placed it in npc2.py with the same things that were already listened there. Copy & paste and changed ID's. After I compiled and restarted server but no-one was able to trade the Santa. Plz help me!

item.title: Making a npc open a shop + having trade button
item.dc:creator: @Maikie61 Maikie61
item.description:
@Maikie61 wrote:

whattehp406:

it’s in your client files not server

im not stupid…

I dont have class5 till class10 lolz!

Read full topic

[/quote]

Lock or move requested[/quote]why it’s just a question
